channel.title: Need Help Adding a New Dungeoneering Interface Button!
channel.description: Ok, so i have been wanting to add dungeoneering but before i do it, i need to add the interface button that shows up when you click inventory. you know, like summoning, hunter, and so on.. thsi si a pic of my inventory. http://my.jetscreenshot.com/demo/20120422-ltxb-34kb i would like to add a new tab under the summoning one. if you can help me do this, i am willing to pay! thanks!
